article_node.title: Top Japanese beverage giant Suntory's chief resigns as he faces a drug probe
article_node.summary: Suntory CEO Takeshi Niinami resigned amid an investigation into alleged possession of an illegal drug, a move the company says is due to governance concerns. The probe began last month, and Niinami has not disclosed details of the substance, which may have been a personal supplement. Suntoryâ€™s president, Torii, will assume full responsibility for the business, including overseas operations, while the company seeks a replacement.
